call_title: The Four states of a UTXO transaction | c8 | Ergoversary 2025

decisions.decision: For seamless user experience, we need at least four transaction states instead of two
decisions.speaker: AI
decisions.context: Classic approach of only unconfirmed and confirmed states is not enough for good UX
decisions.quote: For a seamless user experience, this is not enough. We need at least four.

key_facts.fact: Transactions are included in blocks two to four minutes after entering the mempool
key_facts.speaker: AI

key_facts.fact: Transactions pass through three stages in positive case: prepared, in mempool, confirmed
key_facts.speaker: AI
